trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Colton
There were no other sightings in Colton on or around September 30th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home and was headed east on 'C' street in the city of colton,ca, and just drove under the underpass approaching '7th' street and looked up and noticed a triangle shaped u.f.o. just hovering above the intersection. I was at the stop sign and kept looking and then I made a right turn. As i looked to see it again it was gone. I felt somewhat scared, had the chills, but I was excited that I had actually saw a u.f.o. in broad daylight.
Summary: Triangle shaped, dark blue/black, shiny, hovered for about 15secs and then it was gone.
